botMessages.no-messages: Hey! We still don't have any messages here. Tell me about your goals and I'll help you to achieve them.
botMessages.outOfMessages: Looks like you are out of messages. Please subscribe to continue using the app.

robot.text: Let’s craft your first strategic plan with DarkAI
robot.title: No Chats Yet

deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? You can’t undo this.
deleteConfirmation.title: Confirm Delete

step1.description: Meet your cunning AI assistant, here to help you scheme and succeed with a mischievous twist!
step1.title: Welcome to Dark AI

step2.description: Chat with your Dark Advisor to get strategic advice on any goal—big or small. What’s your next move?
step2.title: Start Scheming

step3.description: Your advisor will check in with playful nudges to keep your plans on track, even when you’re away.
step3.title: Never Lose Momentum

step4.description: Start with free messages, then unlock unlimited cunning advice with a subscription. Ready to rule?
step4.title: Go Limitless

deleteAccount.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
deleteAccount.title: Delete account

robot.text: Sign in to access your strategic plans across all your devices with Dark AI
robot.title: Welcome!

signin.subtitle: To start using AI features please sign in with your Apple ID
signin.title: Sign In
